casebody.data:
Submitted October 30, affirmed November 26, 2008 DONALD SEVERY, Petitioner, v. BOARD OF PAROLE AND POST-PRISON SUPERVISION, Respondent. A132525 197 P3d 59 Peter Gartlan, Chief Defender, and Bronson D. James, Deputy Public Defender, Legal Services Division, Office of Public Defense Services, filed the brief for petitioner. Hardy Myers, Attorney General, Mary H. Williams, Solicitor General, and Denise G. Fjordbeck, Attorney-in-Charge, Civil/Administrative Appeals, filed the brief for respondent. Before Rosenblum, Presiding Judge, and Brewer, Chief Judge, and Riggs, Senior Judge. PER CURIAM!

Board of Parole and Post-Prison Supervision
